description:
While the Oda army is trying to take over Tomonori’s castle, Chidori challenges him to a duel. Tomonori refuses to let Oda conquer him, and wants to live out the rest of his life as a master swordsman. His skill and speed are on another level! Does Chidori have any chance of winning?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fight to the Death Underwater
